alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana and northeastern Shelby Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Logansport, or 13 miles northeast of Center, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Logansport, Joaquin, Huxley, South Mansfield, Grand Cane, Stanley and Reeds Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
